name: Morok: obscuration
description:
A plague descended on the city and only the Doctor can find salvation.
Only you can save the fate of people.
Combine the ingredients and find a cure for the plague.
In your power is a small village and residents who are forced to become part of your research. Be careful with experimentation. The wrong step is very expensive. Hurry up, there is very little time left!

Move around the location and collect the ingredients. Combine them to get a powder or potion. Give potions to the inhabitants and observe the consequences. Keep track of your birth rate and your health. Find the drug as early as possible!
